#define OneShot_Delay (   cnt)
Value:
{HTCFG_ONESHOT_PORT->SR = 0;\
                                                   HTCFG_ONESHOT_PORT->CMP = cnt;\
                                                   HTCFG_ONESHOT_PORT->CR |= (1 << 2);\
                                                   while (HTCFG_ONESHOT_PORT->SR == 0){};}
